content.rendered:
Build your own world with some kind of LEGO bricks in Minecraft, an innovative computer game in which you can create your own virtual reality. Use different blocks to build your personal world. It’s about a Sandbox style game: create your structures during the day, and even fortresses to protect yourself from the dangers of the night.

features

  • Create your own world with LEGO style blocks.
  • Survive the monsters the night with the creation of a bunker.
  • Different game modeseven multiplayer mode.

Create your own world

Develop your own reality, without limits. Build as many structures as you can imagine and take advantage of the different blocks available. Enjoy one of the most innovated games in recent years and a real hit among gamers. Download Minecraft for Linux free.
